channel.title: Runserver Problem.. T_T
channel.description:

item.title: Runserver Problem.. T_T
item.dc:creator: @black_guy42 black guy42
item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

right click ur runserver.bat click on edit and delete everything… then type this in:

@echo off
title servername
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_30/bin/java” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

EXCEPT: change the jdk version to ur version

Read full topic

item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

One thing is you have 2 ‘Bin’ folders.

I’m not sure about the rest, lol.
